Pizza In La Vera: Bringing The Taste Of Italian Cuisine In S

Since 1983, La Vera Pizza has actually upheld an effortless method of offering the first-class pizzeria experience in the country as they've shown by winning 1st spot in a nationwide pizza contest for their, now popular, "Prima" creation. This yummy creation of artichoke hearts sprinkled in pesto sauce adorned with green onions, loaded high with mozzarella cheese, garlic, red peppers, tomato sauce and zesty green olives is available, everyday, on their dinner menu.

Options Readily available to Create Your Own Pizza

Thanks to the delightful recipe and best selection of ingredients you wouldn't dare select any other local, family-owned and operated bistro than La Vera Pizza. No matter the kind of pie you would certainly such as or what you're hungry for, it is all offered at La Vera Pizza. You're able to go with one of the pre-designed preferences or be more imaginative with the option to select your own toppings and design the pizza of your dreams. This is all readily available at 629 4th Street Santa Rosa, CA where they make it the means you desire it.

We Deliver

When you have actually just gotten home from a long day's work, it's time consuming for you to get the loved ones ready for a night out at La Vera Pizza. No worries! We have actually got you covered. La Vera Pizza has both delivery and pick-up orders specifically readily available to you. With these options, you can not fail. The rest is up to us. If you're unsure just what you want, when you call, just let us determine. We'll be more than pleased to walk you with the entire creation procedure, inform you all the different toppings we have and help to design precisely what you hunger for.

Pizzeria Reviews

Don't take our word for it, check out the bistro review websites! Brandon Z. at http://www.yelp.com/biz/la-vera-pizza-santa-rosa from San Rapheal CA specified: "We were starving and had a 45 minute wait at another pizzeria down the street and decided to walk down 4th street while we waited. We walked past La Vera Pizza and the smell of the customers meals from the tables outside smelled so great and looked also better so we made a choice to give it a shot. I have nothing to complain about. Our server was excellent! A younger man, constantly looking at us, got the order down properly, and was in general simply a great server. The meals was perfect. Clam chowder, cheese bread sticks, spinach salad, pizza, and beer was all yummy! I think we located our new favorite pizza location!"

25 Years in the Pizza and Pasta Business

No matter what kind of pie you wish or how hungry you are, right here at La Vera Pizza, you're able to acquire the greatest service and the very best meals in the community. After remaining open for over 25 years, we have actually guarded our craft and are here to deliver. Why else would certainly we be voted # 1 in the nation?

Buy some great tasting pizza in Santa Rosa now! La Vera Pizza is available to serve everyone for more than 25 years. For inquiries about their dishes, check their official site: LaVeraPizza.com and try some great tasting Italian style pizza!
